title: Android apps on Windows 11 will soon be running on Android 12.1
content:
Microsoft is now offering a new version of Windows Subsystem for Android, in testing, that runs all of your apps on the latest Android 12.1.

moreâ€¦

The post Android apps on Windows 11 will soon be running on Android 12.1 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The latest version of Windows 11 Subsystem for Android, in testing, runs all of your apps on the latest Android 12.1.
